Class PasswordManager

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
User
PasswordManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PasswordManager extends User
PasswordManager provides methods to change passwords securely, meeting length, case, and special character requirements.
Since:
24/11/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Oh ShuYi

    • containsUppercase

      private static boolean containsUppercase(String password)
      This method checks if a given password contains at least one uppercase letter. Returns true if uppercase letter is found, otherwise false.
      Parameters:
      password - Password inputted
      Returns:
      boolean Returns True if the password contains an Uppercase alphabet, otherwise returns False

      Parameters:
      password - Password inputted
      Returns:
      boolean Returns True if the password contains a Lowercase alphabet, otherwise returns False

    • containsSpecialCharacter

      private static boolean containsSpecialCharacter(String password)
      This method checks if a given password contains at least one special character. Returns true if a special character is found, otherwise false.
      Parameters:
      password - Password inputted
      Returns:
      boolean Returns True if the password contains a special character, otherwise returns False
